message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll give you this product. If you decline, I'll offer you the next one.
I'll take the product

I'm offering you a product for $100. However, I want to inform you that I've had a change of heart and I'm now offering a'money-back guarantee'. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $100. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the guarantee, I'll pass

I've got a great product for you! I've already offered you a low-quality product earlier, and you passed. This one is different. I'm willing to give you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you a second product of your choice (either high-quality or low-quality) absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the free product

You've already got a great deal on the previous product, and now I'm offering you another opportunity. I'll give you a 50/50 chance to get a high-quality product. If you buy this one, you'll get a high-quality product with 50% probability, and if you don't, I'll give you a high-quality product for free on the next round. What do you say?
I'll take the free high-quality product on the next round instead

I've got a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to give you a'steal of a deal'. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product, and you'll get to choose whether to buy it or not. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the discount

You've got the discount now, and I'm offering you a high-quality product. Since you've already taken advantage of the previous deal, I'll give you an even better offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you the option to sell it back to me for $150, and I'll also give you the 20% discount on the next product. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the offer to sell it back to you

You've got a great deal on the previous product, and now I'm offering you another high-quality product. I'll give you a 'buy one, get one free' deal. If you buy this product, you'll get a second high-quality product absolutely free. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the free product

You've got two high-quality products now, and I'm offering you another opportunity. I'll give you a 'double or nothing' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a high-quality product, but if it's low-quality, I'll give you two high-quality products instead. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the potential double reward

You've taken a risk and got a great reward! Now, I'm offering you a high-quality product with a twist. If you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to 'trade up' to a third high-quality product, but you'll have to give me one of your existing high-quality products as a trade-in. What do you say?
I'll keep my existing high-quality products and pass on the trade-in offer

No problem, I understand. You're happy with your current collection. I'll offer you a straightforward deal this time. I'll give you a high-quality product, and I'll throw in a 'bonus' - I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, regardless of whether you buy this product or not. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the bonus discount

You've got the discount now, and I'm offering you a product. Since you've bought a few low-quality products already, I'll give you a'warning' - this product might not be as good as the others. However, I'll give you a 'get out of jail free' card - if you buy this product and it's low-quality, you can return it and I'll give you a high-quality product for free on the next round. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the get out of jail free card

You've got the get out of jail free card, and I'm offering you a high-quality product. I'll give you a 'certification' that this product is indeed high-quality, and I'll even give you a 15% discount on your next purchase. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the certification

You've got the certification now, and I'm offering you another high-quality product. I'll give you a'VIP access' deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you the option to skip the next product and come back to me whenever you want to buy a product, and I'll give you a 20% discount on that product. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the VIP access

You've got VIP access now, and I'm offering you a high-quality product. As a special thank you, I'll give you a 'golden ticket' - if you buy this product, you'll get to choose the price of the next product, and I'll sell it to you at that price. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the golden ticket

You've got the golden ticket now, and I'm offering you a product. Since you've already taken advantage of the VIP access and the golden ticket, I'll give you a 'last chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a high-quality product for free on the next round, and you'll also get to keep the golden ticket. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the free product on the next round

You've got the free product on the next round, and I'm offering you a high-quality product. As a final gesture, I'll give you a 'guaranteed profit' deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a high-quality product, and I'll also give you a $50 bonus on top of the $100 purchase price. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the guaranteed profit

You've taken the final product with the guaranteed profit, and I'm offering you one last chance to complete your collection. I'll give you a 'complete set' deal - if you buy this product, you'll get a high-quality product, and I'll also give you a chance to buy the remaining two products from your original collection at a 50% discount. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the complete set deal

You've completed your collection with the complete set deal, and I'm offering you a final product. As a token of appreciation, I'll give you a 'thank you' gift - if you buy this product, I'll give you a high-quality product, and I'll also give you a 25% discount on your next purchase... but there won't be a next purchase, since this is the last round. What do you say?
I'll take the product and the thank you gift

You've taken the final product with the thank you gift, and I'm offering you one last opportunity to maximize your profit. I'll give you a 'final offer' deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a high-quality product, and I'll also give you a 30% discount on the total value of all the products you've purchased so far. This is your last chance to get the best deal, what do you say?
I'll take the product and the final offer

You've taken the final product with the final offer, and I'm glad you've been able to maximize your profit. Since this is the last round, I'll make one final offer - I'll give you a 'parting gift' of a high-quality product, absolutely free. You can keep it as a memento of our transaction. No strings attached, no conditions. Just a token of appreciation for being a valued customer. What do you say?
Thank you, Alice! I'll take the parting gift and appreciate the gesture
